mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ratio_code AS "ratioCode", a.kind_name AS "kindName", a.test_date AS "testDate", a.water_ratio AS "waterRatio", a.sand_ratio AS "sandRatio", a.slumps AS "slumps", a.startcapacity AS "startcapacity", a.end_capacity AS "endCapacity", a.kind_water AS "kindWater", a.kind_cement AS "kindCement", a.kind_ag1 AS "kindAg1", a.kind_ag2 AS "kindAg2", a.kind_ag3 AS "kindAg3", a.kind_ag4 AS "kindAg4", a.kind_flyash AS "kindFlyash", a.kind_breeze AS "kindBreeze", a.kind_add1 AS "kindAdd1", a.kind_add2 AS "kindAdd2", a.kind_backup1 AS "kindBackup1", a.kind_slops AS "kindSlops", a.dosage_water AS "dosageWater", a.dosage_cement AS "dosageCement", a.dosage_ag1 AS "dosageAg1", a.dosage_ag2 AS "dosageAg2", a.dosage_ag3 AS "dosageAg3", a.dosage_ag4 AS "dosageAg4", a.dosage_flyash AS "dosageFlyash", a.dosage_breeze AS "dosageBreeze", a.dosage_add1 AS "dosageAdd1", a.dosage_add2 AS "dosageAdd2", a.dosage_backup1 AS "dosageBackup1", a.dosage_slops AS "dosageSlops", a.prop_water AS "propWater", a.prop_cement AS "propCement", a.prop_ag1 AS "propAg1", a.prop_ag2 AS "propAg2", a.prop_ag3 AS "propAg3", a.prop_ag4 AS "propAg4", a.prop_flyash AS "propFlyash", a.prop_breeze AS "propBreeze", a.prop_add1 AS "propAdd1", a.prop_add2 AS "propAdd2", a.prop_backup1 AS "propBackup1", a.prop_slops AS "propSlops", a.price_water AS "priceWater", a.price_cement AS "priceCement", a.price_ag1 AS "priceAg1", a.price_ag2 AS "priceAg2", a.price_ag3 AS "priceAg3", a.price_ag4 AS "priceAg4", a.price_flyash AS "priceFlyash", a.price_breeze AS "priceBreeze", a.price_add1 AS "priceAdd1", a.price_add2 AS "priceAdd2", a.price_backup1 AS "priceBackup1", a.price_slops AS "priceSlops", a.amount_water AS "amountWater", a.amount_cement AS "amountCement", a.amount_ag1 AS "amountAg1", a.amount_ag2 AS "amountAg2", a.amount_ag3 AS "amountAg3", a.amount_ag4 AS "amountAg4", a.amount_flyash AS "amountFlyash", a.amount_breeze AS "amountBreeze", a.amount_add1 AS "amountAdd1", a.amount_add2 AS "amountAdd2", a.amount_backup1 AS "amountBackup1", a.amount_slops AS "amountSlops", a.create_person AS "createPerson", a.check_person AS "checkPerson", a.make_date AS "makeDate", a.check_date AS "checkDate", a.ratio_cost AS "ratioCost", a.ratio_owner AS "docOfficework.officeworkName", a.ratio_remark AS "ratioRemark", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coordinate_ratio( ratio_code, kind_name, test_date, water_ratio, sand_ratio, slumps, startcapacity, end_capacity, kind_water, kind_cement, kind_ag1, kind_ag2, kind_ag3, kind_ag4, kind_flyash, kind_breeze, kind_add1, kind_add2, kind_backup1, kind_slops, dosage_water, dosage_cement, dosage_ag1, dosage_ag2, dosage_ag3, dosage_ag4, dosage_flyash, dosage_breeze, dosage_add1, dosage_add2, dosage_backup1, dosage_slops, prop_water, prop_cement, prop_ag1, prop_ag2, prop_ag3, prop_ag4, prop_flyash, prop_breeze, prop_add1, prop_add2, prop_backup1, prop_slops, price_water, price_cement, price_ag1, price_ag2, price_ag3, price_ag4, price_flyash, price_breeze, price_add1, price_add2, price_backup1, price_slops, amount_water, amount_cement, amount_ag1, amount_ag2, amount_ag3, amount_ag4, amount_flyash, amount_breeze, amount_add1, amount_add2, amount_backup1, amount_slops, create_person, check_person, make_date, check_date, ratio_cost, ratio_owner, ratio_remark, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{ratioCode}, #{kindName}, #{testDate}, #{waterRatio}, #{sandRatio}, #{slumps}, #{startcapacity}, #{endCapacity}, #{kindWater}, #{kindCement}, #{kindAg1}, #{kindAg2}, #{kindAg3}, #{kindAg4}, #{kindFlyash}, #{kindBreeze}, #{kindAdd1}, #{kindAdd2}, #{kindBackup1}, #{kindSlops}, #{dosageWater}, #{dosageCement}, #{dosageAg1}, #{dosageAg2}, #{dosageAg3}, #{dosageAg4}, #{dosageFlyash}, #{dosageBreeze}, #{dosageAdd1}, #{dosageAdd2}, #{dosageBackup1}, #{dosageSlops}, #{propWater}, #{propCement}, #{propAg1}, #{propAg2}, #{propAg3}, #{propAg4}, #{propFlyash}, #{propBreeze}, #{propAdd1}, #{propAdd2}, #{propBackup1}, #{propSlops}, #{priceWater}, #{priceCement}, #{priceAg1}, #{priceAg2}, #{priceAg3}, #{priceAg4}, #{priceFlyash}, #{priceBreeze}, #{priceAdd1}, #{priceAdd2}, #{priceBackup1}, #{priceSlops}, #{amountWater}, #{amountCement}, #{amountAg1}, #{amountAg2}, #{amountAg3}, #{amountAg4}, #{amountFlyash}, #{amountBreeze}, #{amountAdd1}, #{amountAdd2}, #{amountBackup1}, #{amountSlops}, #{createPerson}, #{checkPerson}, #{makeDate}, #{checkDate}, #{ratioCost}, #{docOfficework.officeworkName}, #{ratioRemark}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
